segments.text: I am calling to find out why I didn ’ t receive an unemployment check this week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you send in your Continued Claim Form for the last period ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I forgot to send it in !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to be very careful to send that form in every two weeks if you want to get paid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I send it in now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should look at your claim form and see if it has been more than fourteen days since it was due . If it hasn ’ t been , we will still accept it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I mail it in early next time so it isn ’ t late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , you cannot mail it in early , as it needs to reflect all of the information up to the due date .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Will my paycheck come right away now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your check will arrive a little late .
segments.speaker: S2
